snippet.title: Martian Invaders
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2182960/Martian_Invaders/

Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/martian-invaders-2bc51f

Microsoft: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9nrwc79fcb31

Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/LoadUpGames-com-Martian-Invaders/dp/B085QBKH4C

Google: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.loadupgames.martianinvaders


A New Retro Classic Space Shooter Arcade Game!

WE HAVE ALIENS, YOU DON'T!

Defend Earth from waves of martian invaders and flying saucers in this modern version of a space shooter. Start out with a defensive shield while blasting your way through 30 stages of invaders with robotic voice effects. Get bonus points for saving the army men and get the high score.

FEATURES

- A Modern Version of an 80’s Space Shooter.
- 30 Stages with Robotic Voice Effects.
- Waves of Martian Invaders and Flying Saucers.
- Destructible Defensive Shield.
- Bonus Points for Army Men Saved.
- Arcade High Score.
- Gamepad Support.

Go Back to the 1980’s and Blast these Martians Back into Outer Space!
